                                                                                                  double yCross)
        "Total", "x+", "y+", "++", "+-", "-+", and "--" are the keys to the data.

        yThresh -

        Returns:

      • calculateStats_SingleThreshold

        public static java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> calculateStats_SingleThreshold(boolean isVerticalThresh,
                                                                                                  double thresh,
                                                                                                  double cross)
        "Total", "+", and "-" are the keys to the data. This can be called after calling plotXYData which loads the variables 'x' and 'y'
        Parameters:
        isVerticalThresh -
        thresh -
        cross -
        Returns:
